thread.title: Federal Court orders halt to Border Force phone confiscation plans
thread.title_full: Federal Court orders halt to Border Force phone confiscation plans

author: Adam Gartrell
title: Federal Court orders halt to Border Force phone confiscation plans
text:
Refugee Resource Action Centre advocate Pamela Curr. Photo: Michelle Smith 
Access to landlines is heavily regulated by detention centre operators and does not provide adequate privacy, she said. She believes the Border Force is trying to make it harder for detainees to have contact with the outside world. 
Detainees are not allowed to have phones with cameras or recording apps. Under current rules authorities can take phones under certain circumstances, but the injunction means they cannot implement a blanket ban. 
The court will conduct a full hearing at a later date. Advertisement
